API_HASH.description: Enter your api_hash, get it from my.telegram.org

API_ID.description: Enter your api_id, get it from my.telegram.org

BOT_TOKEN.description: Enter your bot_token, get it from @botfather bot in telegram

CMD_TRIGGER.description: Enter your preferred command trigger, default is '.'

DATABASE_URL.description: Enter your database_url, get it from cloud.mongodb.com

LOG_CHANNEL_ID.description: Enter your log channel id, it should be a private channel preferrably

STRING_SESSION.description: Enter your session string, use @UX_session_bot for it
